entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 24.

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h this evening. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
